tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE neural_network_training_data (
    training_id UUID,
    input_data JSON,
    output_data JSON,
    primary key (training_id)
)

CREATE TABLE neural_networks (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    name TEXT,
    training_status TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE training_data (
    data_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    neural_network_id INT,
    data_input TEXT,
    data_output TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE training_logs (
    log_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    neural_network_id INT,
    log_text TEXT,
    log_time TIMESTAMP
)
